messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So we have abductors, lings, revenants, and traitors? Why not a nuke op team to top it off.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Sorrel Kemble is valid for annoying me.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I just killed the revenant what a looser.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Better hope it's a false alarm.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Cap, ssstand the fuck down, i wasss sssent by NT to help your asss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Space Station 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be a Getmore Chocolate Corp.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.
